remarks: Define the set of linear operators on Hilbert space.  (See ~ df-hosum for definition of operator.)  (Contributed by NM, 18-Jan-2006.) (New usage is discouraged.)
statement:
df-lnop $p |- LinOp = { t e. ( ~H ^m ~H ) | A. x e. CC A. y e. ~H A. z e. ~H ( t ` ( ( x .h y ) +h z ) ) = ( ( x .h ( t ` y ) ) +h ( t ` z ) ) } $.
$d t x y z $.
